The Donald Rumsfeld case is that there was no alternative: I was perfectly willing to shutter the facility if a better alternative could have been found that would be as effective in obtaining intelligence and preventing terrorists from returning to the fight. But no alternative to Gitmo was proposed. Of those wrongly imprisoned, there is no mention. Stuff happens, he seems to be saying.
